mapper.insert: INSERT INTO materias (materia, creditos, idMateriaAnt, idPrograma) VALUES (#{materia},#{creditos},#{materiaAnt.idMateria},#{programa.idPrograma})
mapper.update: UPDATE materias SET materia=#{materia}, creditos=#{creditos}, idMateriaAnt=#{materiaAnt.idMateria}, idPrograma=#{programa.idPrograma} WHERE idMateria=#{idMateria }
mapper.select: SELECT M.idMateria, M.materia, M.creditos,P.idPrograma,P.programa,M.idMateriaAnt FROM materias M INNER JOIN programa P on M.idPrograma=P.idPrograma;
